sentence.Network_en: I spread afore him my humble store, like the Bee.
sentence.Network_cn: 我用我象蜜蜂般积攒的那点东西款待他.

sentence.Network_en: We're doing our best , afore she comes.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在她来以前尽量想办法.

sentence.Network_en: He should have come afore, if he wanted to stop it, and marry her himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是他要拦这门亲事, 想自己娶她,那他就该早回来呀.

auth_sentence.content: Till he had made amends, and full restore For all the damage which he had him doen afore.

auth_sentence.content: Plus, as an unexpected, added, attraction, their stores look and smell cleaner than their afore-mentioned competition.
